parameter.name: formId
parameter.description: ID of the form whose submissions would be listed.

parameter.name: encryptionPassword
parameter.description: The encryption password for the form.

parameter.name: minTime
parameter.description: Return submissions after given date/time - YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS expected (Based around Eastern Time).

parameter.name: maxTime
parameter.description: Return submissions before given date/time - YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:SS expected (Based around Eastern Time).

parameter.name: searchFields
parameter.description: Field ids for search_values_x. Where x is a number 0-10 (note: encrypted forms are not searchable).

parameter.name: searchValues
parameter.description: Search a specific field for this value. Where x is a number 0-10 corresponding with search_field_x (note: encrypted forms are not searchable).

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: The page number of results to return.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: The number of submissions to return per page. Maximum of 100 per request.

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: Sort the submissions by id with DESC or ASC.
